Name: Trial Of Destiny
About the game: Glen is summoned from a different world to save Gaia from the Destiny, The dark lord of creations and destructions. In this world, All the combat laws act differently from other worlds. All the actions included Dash are cards. When activated a card, the card will be placed randomly on the ground. If you pick them up the cards on the ground, you can activate them again. Trial Of Destiny is a fast-paced action RPG + rogue-like + card game. key Features Epic anime battle Unique action RPG and card game mechanic Deck building Bullet hell Game-breaking power up OP Bosses Ultimate card The ultimate cards are powerful card that can be activated only when your mana is fully charged. Whenever you pick up a card, your mana will be charged. The ultimate card is the only card that will NOT drop from your hand. Dash, Dodge the enemy's attacks, collect the cards and unleash the ultimate power. Trial Of Destiny Is Right Now Under Development For more update and discussion Please join the discord, Follow us on Facebook and Twitter.
